name: Spoon XML Application Configuration File
summary: Learn about .XAPPL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Spoon tools are used for virtualizing existing applications (EXE files) and their associated data. This enables businesses and other users to launch pre-configured applications without having to perform custom installations.

description: File created by Spoon Virtual Application Studio, a program used for creating virtualized applications; stores the input application, the virtualization settings, and build settings required to create the output virtual application; after built, can be run as a standalone executable (.EXE), with Spoon's Virtual Desktop Server, or from the Spoon.net website as a hosted application.
